header.gameNote: AMERICA EAST CONF TR AT VESTAL NY

article.description:
Brian Hodges scored 33 points to lead Maryland Baltimore-County over Stony Brook 88-70 in the first round
of the America East Conference tournament on Friday night.
article.headline: Hodges scores 33 in Retrievers win over Seawolves
article.linkText: Hodges scores 33 in Retrievers win over Seawolves
article.story: VESTAL, N.Y. (AP) -- Brian Hodges scored 33 points to lead Maryland Baltimore-County over Stony Brook 88-70 in the first round of the America East Conference tournament on Friday night. The eighth-seeded Retrievers shot 58 percent from the floor to advance to the quarterfinals against top-seeded Albany on Saturday. UMBC (10-18), which had four scorers in double figures, used a 17-2 run midway through the second half to put the game away, taking a 72-54 lead with eight minutes to play. Ninth-seeded Stony Brook had three scorers in double figures, including Mike Popoko with 14 points. The Seawolves (4-24) opened the game with a 14-4 lead, but a 10-0 run by UMBC tied it with 11:20 left in the first half. Chris Pugh's 3-pointer with two seconds left gave the Retrievers a 39-37 lead at halftime. Hodges was 10-of-10 from the free-throw line, made five 3-pointers and grabbed eight rebounds. Jay Greene and Jerrell Dinkins had 13 points apiece. John Zito, who leads UMBC with 14 points per game, left the game with a knee injury with five minutes to play.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
